mapper.select: SELECT CommentID, PostID, InsertUsername, body, CountBookmarks, DateInserted, isActive, image FROM Comment, user WHERE POSTID = #{postID} AND IsActive = 1 AND (Comment.InsertUsername = user.Username) ORDER BY DateInserted DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT into Comment (InsertUserName, body, CountBookmarks,DateInserted, IsActive, PostID) VALUES (#{insertUsername},#{body}, #{countBookmarks}, #{dateInserted}, #{isActive}, #{postID})
